2. Please note that physical samples are also considered data that you can include in the table
4. A metadata standard collection that may be useful for your work is the MIBBI (https://fairsharing.org/3518) or OME for microscopy (https://fairsharing.org/3502). Please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you like to discuss this in more detail. For reporting of animal experiments journals may ask to follow the arrive guidelines: (https://arriveguidelines.org/)
7. For data sharing you can also use KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or domain specific repositories such as those from NCBI or EMBL-EBI (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission); F1000 research also gives a good list of recommendations (https://f1000research.com/for-authors/data-guidelines)
